name: RefileRequestService
description: Lambda for the NYPL Refile Request API Service

scripts.manual-deploy-development: ./node_modules/.bin/node-lambda deploy -e development -f config/var_development.env -S config/event_sources_development.json -b subnet-f4fe56af -g sg-1d544067 -P nypl-sandbox -o arn:aws:iam::224280085904:role/lambda_basic_execution
scripts.manual-deploy-qa: ./node_modules/.bin/node-lambda deploy -e qa -f config/var_qa.env -S config/event_sources_qa.json -b subnet-f35de0a9,subnet-21a3b244 -g sg-aa74f1db -o arn:aws:iam::946183545209:role/lambda-full-access -P nypl-digital-dev
scripts.manual-deploy-production: ./node_modules/.bin/node-lambda deploy -e production -f config/var_production.env -S config/event_sources_production.json -b subnet-59bcdd03,subnet-5deecd15 -g sg-116eeb60 -P nypl-digital-dev -o arn:aws:iam::946183545209:role/lambda-full-access
scripts.deploy-development: ./node_modules/.bin/node-lambda deploy -e development -f config/var_development.env -S config/event_sources_development.json -b subnet-f4fe56af -g sg-1d544067 -a $AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID_DEVELOPMENT -s $AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY_DEVELOPMENT -o arn:aws:iam::224280085904:role/lambda_basic_execution
scripts.deploy-qa: ./node_modules/.bin/node-lambda deploy -e qa -f config/var_qa.env -S config/event_sources_qa.json -b subnet-f35de0a9,subnet-21a3b244 -g sg-aa74f1db -o arn:aws:iam::946183545209:role/lambda-full-access -a $AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID_QA -s $AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY_QA
scripts.deploy-production: ./node_modules/.bin/node-lambda deploy -e production -f config/var_production.env -S config/event_sources_production.json -b subnet-59bcdd03,subnet-5deecd15 -g sg-116eeb60 -o arn:aws:iam::946183545209:role/lambda-full-access -a $AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID_PRODUCTION -s $AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY_PRODUCTION
